original: gnod pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su bzung ba dang / ngan song las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang / 'jig tshogs las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang / theg pas yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang /
analyzed: gnod pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su bzung ba dang / ngan song las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang / 'jig tshogs las yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang / theg pas yongs su bskyab pa'i rjes su gzung ba dang /
translated: It is to be a refuge from harm. It is to be a refuge from the lower realms. It is to be a refuge from the view of the transitory collection. It is to be a refuge through the vehicles.

original: rjes su gzung ba tshad med pas sems can tshad med pa dag la dus thams cad du nye bar gnas ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su gzung ba tshad med pas sems can tshad med pa dag la dus thams cad du nye bar gnas ba'o //
translated: It is to be present at all times for limitless beings through limitless forms of refuge.

original: de la thabs la mkhas pa dpag tu med pa ni /
analyzed: de la thabs la mkhas pa dpag tu med pa ni /
translated: “What is skill in methods?

original: thabs la mkhas pa gang dang gang gis sems can tshad med pa dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste; yang na rigs pa yang dag par bstan pas sam /🔽yang na bag med pa yang dag par bskul bas sam /🔽yang na zhum pa gzengs bstod pas sam /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa gang dang gang gis sems can tshad med pa dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste; yang na rigs pa yang dag par bstan pas sam / yang na bag med pa yang dag par bskul bas sam / yang na zhum pa gzengs bstod pas sam /
translated: It is the skill in methods by which limitless beings are guided, whether through the teaching of logic,🔽through the encouragement of those who are careless,

original: yang na yang dag par @39a *//
analyzed: yang na yang dag par @39a *//
translated: through the uplifting of those who are discouraged,

original: sgrub pa yang dag par dga' bar bya bas sam /
analyzed: sgrub pa yang dag par dga' bar bya bas sam /

original: yang na tshig drag po'i sbyor bas sam /
analyzed: yang na tshig drag po'i sbyor bas sam /

original: yang na tshig 'jam po'i sbyor bas sam /
analyzed: yang na tshig 'jam po'i sbyor bas sam /

original: yang na bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas kyis chos dang mthun pa nyid kun tu bstan pas sam /
analyzed: yang na bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas kyis chos dang mthun pa nyid kun tu bstan pas sam /

original: yang na rnam par dag par skye ba'i lus kun tu bstan pas sam /
analyzed: yang na rnam par dag par skye ba'i lus kun tu bstan pas sam /
translated: Or else, by means of the teaching of the body which is born in a pure place.

original: yang na rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul kun tu bstan pas sam /🔽yang na kun bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sam /
analyzed: yang na rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul kun tu bstan pas sam / yang na kun bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sam /
translated: Or else, by means of the teaching of the miracle of the magical transformation of the superknowledges.🔽Or else, by means of the teaching of the miracle of reading the thoughts of others.

original: yang na rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul kun tu bstan pas sam /
analyzed: yang na rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul kun tu bstan pas sam /
translated: Or else, by means of the teaching of the miracle of instruction.

original: de lta bu'i tshul gyi thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa dag gis sems can tshad med pa dag 'dul lo //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshul gyi thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa dag gis sems can tshad med pa dag 'dul lo //
translated: In this way, by means of immeasurable skillful means, he converts immeasurable sentient beings.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de la dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni /
analyzed: de la dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni /
translated: the immeasurable greatness of the Three Jewels

original: rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: is threefold.

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa dang / chos dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa dang / chos dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: and the greatness of the Jewel of the Community is immeasurable.

original: de la sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni /
translated: The greatness of the Jewel of the Buddha is immeasurable.

original: rnam pa bdun du khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam pa bdun du khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood in seven ways:

original: mngon par shes pa chen po brnyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba dang / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / chos kyi sku rtag pa nyid kyi phyir @39b de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zad mi shes pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa chen po brnyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba dang / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / chos kyi sku rtag pa nyid kyi phyir @39b de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zad mi shes pa dang /
translated: The body of the Tathagata is inexhaustible because he has attained the great superknowledges, because he has power over all dharmas, because he has nonabiding Nirvana, because he has an inconceivable body of liberation, and because he has the eternal Dharma Body.

original: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brtsams pa rgyun ma bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brtsams pa rgyun ma bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa dang /
translated: The Tathagata is spontaneous because he has uninterruptedly begun the deeds of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod chen po la longs spyod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod che ba dang / 'jig rten du byung yang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi gos pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa med pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod chen po la longs spyod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod che ba dang / 'jig rten du byung yang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi gos pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa med pa dang /
translated: The Tathagata is of great enjoyment because he enjoys the completely pure buddhafields and the great enjoyment of the Dharma. The Tathagata is unstained because he is not stained by worldly things even though he has appeared in the world.

original: rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can gyi khams tshad med pa yongs su smin par mdzad cing rnam par grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa don che ba'o //

translated: The Tathagata is of great purpose because he always and uninterruptedly brings to full maturity and liberation the immeasurable realms of sentient beings.

original: de la chos dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni /
analyzed: de la chos dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa ni /
translated: The greatness of the Jewel of Dharma is immeasurable.

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Son of noble family!

original: gang chos kyang ma yin la chos med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyang ma yin la 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'ang ma yin la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang chos kyang ma yin la chos med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyang ma yin la 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'ang ma yin la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ma yin pa'o //
translated: The Dharma of the bodhisattvas is not a phenomenon, nor is it the absence of a phenomenon. It is not desire, nor is it free from desire. It is not saṃsāra, nor is it nirvāṇa.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos de ni /🔽'khor bar snang ba'i chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang / de na'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing sems @40a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos de ni / 'khor bar snang ba'i chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang / de na'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing sems @40a *//
translated: The Dharma of the bodhisattvas

original: can gyi khams dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mtshungs te mi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad la shin tu phan pa dang / bde ba'i gnas la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir 'khor ba'am /
analyzed: can gyi khams dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mtshungs te mi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad la shin tu phan pa dang / bde ba'i gnas la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir 'khor ba'am /
translated: is not to abandon the phenomena that appear in saṃsāra, yet it is completely free from affliction. It is equal to space, to the realm of sentient beings, and to the limit of reality, and it is inexhaustible. It is the basis for the complete benefit and happiness of all sentient beings, whether in saṃsāra or nirvāṇa.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o //🔽de la dge 'dun dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dpag tu med pa la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni /

translated: It does not dwell in any nirvāṇa at all.🔽The greatness of the Saṅgha Jewel is immeasurable.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge 'dun dkon mchog ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge 'dun dkon mchog ste /
translated: The Saṅgha Jewel of the bodhisattvas is the Saṅgha Jewel of the bodhisattvas.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni /

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis rab tu che ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis rab tu che ba'o //
translated: is the greatness of the bodhisattva saṅgha.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: rnam grangs 'dis sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mnyam par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs 'dis sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mnyam par blta'o //
translated: by this method, the greatness of the Buddha Jewel and the Saṅgha Jewel of the bodhisattvas should be seen as equal.

original: de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /

analyzed: gang sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di 'dra ba las brtsams te bdag dad pa skyes pa dang / chos dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di 'dra ba las brtsams te bdag dad pa skyes pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di 'dra ba las brtsams te bdag dad pa skyes pa ni /
translated: “I have gained a great gain in that faith has arisen in me with regard to the greatness of the Buddha Jewel,🔽faith has arisen in me with regard to the greatness of the Dharma Jewel,

original: bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //🔽bdag la ni /
analyzed: bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do // bdag la ni /
translated: and faith has arisen in me with regard to the greatness of the Saṅgha Jewel.

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di lta bu thob par bya ba'i skal ba yod do //🔽bdag la ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi che ba nyid 'di lta bu thob par bya ba'i skal ba yod do // bdag la ni /
translated: I have the fortune to attain such greatness of the Buddha Jewel.
